tool.name: chromstaR enrichment

param.name: numLoci
param.label: Number of random loci to use in the count heatmap. Leave empty to use all loci.

param.name: sortBySample
param.label: Number of sample by which the count heatmap is sorted. Leave empty to sort and color by combinations.

tool.help:
Options: -o CHROMSTAROBJECT, --chromstarObject=CHROMSTAROBJECT File with chromstaR object.
-a ANNOTATIONBED6, --annotationBed6=ANNOTATIONBED6 Annotation file in BED6 format.
-b BPAROUNDANNOTATION, --bpAroundAnnotation=BPAROUNDANNOTATION Base-pairs to consider around annotation. Default is 10000.
-i NUMINTERVALS, --numIntervals=NUMINTERVALS Intervals to consider inside annotation. Default is 20.
-s STATISTIC, --statistic=STATISTIC Statistic to calculate. Either 'fold' or 'fraction'. Default is fold.
-l NUMLOCI, --numLoci=NUMLOCI Maximum number of rows for the count heatmap. Default is 1000.
-S SORTBYSAMPLE, --sortBySample=SORTBYSAMPLE Number of the sample by which the count heatmap is to be sorted. Default is NULL.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
